channel.title: Getting Started on SmartWeb Support
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on SmartWeb Support

item.title: What kind of service is SmartWeb?
item.description:
SmartWeb Overview link

SmartWeb is a service that provides two solutions to accelerate business growth by combining cutting-edge AI technology with a high-speed web infrastructure.

SmartWeb is delivered with initial setup completed, allowing you to start operations immediately.

Two Solutions link

AI Customer Support link

Complete integration of LiveAgent and FlowHunt AI enables 24/7 multilingual customer support automation. You can dramatically improve operational efficiency without compromising support quality.

Key Features:

item.title: What are SmartWeb's greatest features?
item.description:
SmartWeb’s Greatest Features link

SmartWeb’s greatest feature is that it provides two solutions in a seamless, end-to-end manner.

1. AI Customer Support link

Complete integration of LiveAgent and FlowHunt AI enables automated customer support in multiple languages, 24/7/365. This dramatically improves operational efficiency without compromising support quality.

Key strengths:

  • Achieves 73% reduction in response time and 82% reduction in support workload
  • Instant responses via AI chatbot supporting 100+ languages
  • Smooth escalation to human agents for complex cases

2. AI Content Creation & Web Development link

Automates all aspects of content marketing with AI. Provides end-to-end solutions from creating blog articles and glossaries to building ultra-fast websites using Hugo.

item.title: Why Should You Choose SmartWeb?
item.description:
5 Reasons to Choose SmartWeb link

1. Comprehensive Delivery of Two Solutions link

SmartWeb provides two solutions: “AI Customer Support” and “AI Content Creation & Web Development.” We comprehensively support business growth from streamlining customer support to accelerating content marketing.

2. Complete Integration of LiveAgent and FlowHunt AI link

Complete integration of the globally used help desk system “LiveAgent” and AI automated response platform “FlowHunt.” You can immediately build a high-functionality customer support system without the hassle of individual implementation and setup.

item.title: What are the main benefits of implementing SmartWeb?
item.description:
Main Implementation Benefits of SmartWeb link

SmartWeb offers two solutions, each providing the following benefits.

AI Customer Support Benefits link

1. 73% Reduction in Response Time link

AI chatbots respond to customer inquiries instantly 24/7/365. Compared to traditional human support, average response time is reduced by 73%, significantly decreasing customer wait times.

2. 82% Reduction in Support Workload link

Using RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technology, the system quickly searches your manuals, FAQs, and documents for only the necessary information and automatically generates optimal responses. Automated responses to routine questions reduce support team burden by 82%.

item.title: What types of companies is SmartWeb suitable for?
item.description:
Companies Where SmartWeb is Most Suitable link

SmartWeb is particularly well-suited for the following types of companies:

Companies Suitable for AI Customer Support link

Companies facing customer inquiry challenges:

  • Overwhelmed by increasing customer inquiries
  • Unable to provide support outside business hours or on holidays
  • Inconsistent response quality
  • Scattered response histories that are difficult to manage

Companies requiring multilingual support:

  • Increasing inquiries from overseas
  • Shortage of multilingual support staff

Companies Suitable for AI Content Creation & Web Development link

Companies looking to strengthen content marketing:

item.title: What kind of company is Interwork?
item.description:
Overview of Interwork link

Basic Company Information link

Interwork Co., Ltd. is an IT company with high expertise in the customer support solution field. As the official Japanese distributor of LiveAgent and FlowHunt, we work closely with Quality Unit to provide SmartWeb services.

Company Characteristics link

We are a company characterized by over 20 years of extensive experience and high security management capabilities with ISMS certification.

Services Provided link

SmartWeb link

SmartWeb is a service provided by Interwork that combines two solutions: AI customer support and AI content creation & web development.

item.title: SmartWeb Free Consultation
item.description:
SmartWeb Free Consultation Overview link

We offer free online consultations of approximately 20 minutes for companies considering SmartWeb implementation. Using online meeting tools such as Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Google Meet, you can consult with us completely free of charge.

Consultation Topics Available link

About AI Customer Support:

  • AI chatbot features and utilization methods
  • Implementation benefits of AI-integrated ticket systems
  • Mechanisms of AI email response creation
  • Use cases for AI response assist

About AI Content Creation and Web Development:

item.title: Are there any implementation case studies?
item.description:
Overview of Implementation Cases link

LiveAgent and FlowHunt have numerous implementation records domestically and internationally as cloud solutions that support corporate customer support and operational efficiency. Companies of various industries and sizes are leveraging these tools to improve customer experience and optimize business processes.

SmartWeb Implementation Results link

Companies that have implemented SmartWeb have reported the following specific results:

AI Customer Support Effects link

  • 73% reduction in response time: AI chatbots provide instant responses, significantly reducing customer wait times
  • 82% reduction in support workload: Automated responses to routine questions reduce the burden on support teams
  • 24/7 availability: Zero opportunity loss outside business hours
  • Support for 100 languages: Flexible response to global inquiries

AI Content Creation and Web Development Effects link

  • 70% reduction in article creation time: Efficient content production through AI automation
  • Creation of 1,200+ glossary entries: Built specialized terminology collections in Japanese and English in a short period
  • Continuous customer acquisition from search engines: Increased traffic through SEO-optimized content

LiveAgent Implementation Cases link

CVFR Travel Group Implementation Results link

CVFR Travel Group achieved the following specific results through LiveAgent implementation:

item.title: Is phased implementation possible?
item.description:
Possibility of Phased Implementation link

Phased Implementation Approach link

SmartWeb is a service that can be flexibly implemented according to your organization’s needs. Rather than implementing all features at once from the beginning, it’s possible to start with the necessary functions and gradually expand the scope of use in phases.

Benefits of Phased Implementation link

Phased implementation offers the following important benefits:

  • Initial investment can be minimized, allowing flexible implementation according to budget
  • Migration risks to new systems can be minimized
  • Functions can be expanded gradually according to your organization’s readiness and operational capacity
  • Staff learning curve can be made gradual, enabling smooth transition

Phased Implementation Example for AI Customer Support link

Phase 1: Start with AI Chatbot link

  • Begin 24/7 automatic response simply by installing on your website
  • AI trained on your company’s manuals, FAQs, and product information provides answers
  • Zero opportunity loss during non-business hours

Phase 2: Add AI-Integrated Ticketing System link

  • Centrally manage inquiries from email, chat, and social media
  • Achieve zero missed responses through automatic ticket creation
  • Significantly reduce staff workload

Phase 3: Add AI Email Response Creation & AI Response Assist link

  • Automatically create response drafts for inquiry emails
  • AI supports operators in writing responses
  • Achieve consistently high-quality customer service

Phased Implementation Example for AI Content Creation & Web Development link

Phase 1: Start with AI Content Creation link

  • Automatically generate blog articles and technical glossaries
  • Automatically add metadata necessary for SEO optimization
  • Reduce article creation time by 70%

Phase 2: Add Hugo High-Speed Web Development link

  • Achieve overwhelming display speed with static site generation
  • Eliminate security risks by not requiring databases
  • Reduce operational costs with serverless architecture

Implementation Support link

SmartWeb is delivered with initial setup already completed. The SmartWeb team will support phased implementation and gradual feature additions at each phase, so please feel free to contact us for consultation.

item.title: What about training during implementation?
item.description:
Training Overview link

Yes, we provide training during implementation.

Training Content by Target Audience link

Administrator Training link

  • System configuration
  • User management
  • How to read reports

Operator Training link

  • Basic operations
  • Ticket handling
  • Chat response methods

AI Chatbot Training link

  • How to register and update learning data

Training Implementation Format link

Training Method link

  • Online remote training (Zoom, etc.)

Documentation Provided link

  • Operation manual provision
  • Video manuals are also being prepared sequentially

Support System link

Post-Implementation Support link

  • Support desk handles any questions
  • Additional training is also available (additional fees apply)

Customization Options link

We also provide customized training tailored to your business needs.

item.title: What is the post-implementation support system?
item.description:
Three-Tier Support System link

SmartWeb provides a comprehensive three-tier support system.

Tier Provider Language Content
Tier 1 Interwork (SmartWeb) Japanese Primary contact & general support
Tier 2 LiveAgent English (24/7) Advanced technical issues
Tier 3 FlowHunt English AI functionality specialized support

Japanese Support (Interwork) link

Customers can basically complete everything with Japanese support only.

Support Content link

Content Description
Primary Contact Japanese staff response
Proxy Support Acting as intermediary for LiveAgent and FlowHunt inquiries
Post-Implementation Tuning Free consultation for feature enhancement
Continuous Improvement Optimization proposals aligned with business growth

Customer Benefits link

  • Peace of mind without language barriers
  • We handle communication with overseas vendors
  • Support tailored to Japanese business practices

LiveAgent Support link

For advanced technical issues, LiveAgent’s specialized team provides support.

item.title: Is migration from other companies easy?
item.description:
To use SmartWeb’s AI customer support features (AI chatbot, AI email creation, AI answer assist, etc.), you need to migrate your ticket system to LiveAgent.

Easy switching with migration plugins link

Migration plugins are available from major ticket systems such as Zendesk and Freshdesk. Using these plugins, you can import existing FAQ data and ticket history as-is.

Migration process link

  1. Export data from current system - Export existing ticket history, FAQ data, customer information, etc.
  2. Import to LiveAgent - Automatically import data using migration plugins
  3. Configure AI customer support features - Enable AI functionality through integration with FlowHunt

If you have any questions about migration, please feel free to contact us.

item.title: Is data migration possible?
item.description:
Data Migration Possibilities link

SmartWeb provides simple and efficient support for data migration from your existing systems. This allows you to smoothly transition services without losing valuable customer support information.

Supported Systems link

We currently offer data migration plugins for major customer support platforms including Zendesk, Freshdesk, LiveAgent, and FlowHunt. These plugins facilitate data integration between different systems and significantly simplify the migration process.

The specific migration targets we support include:

item.title: Can it be integrated with existing sites?
item.description:
Flexible Deployment of Chat Widgets link

SmartWeb provides high flexibility that allows seamless integration with your existing website. You can deploy chat tools in the most optimal way according to your site’s characteristics and objectives. Both partial and comprehensive integration is possible, adapting to your website’s structure and requirements.

Partial Integration Available link

You can add chat widgets only to necessary sections without burdening your existing website. For example, you can limit deployment to pages that require customer support or inquiry sections. Chat support functionality can be seamlessly integrated while maintaining your site’s overall design and functionality.

item.title: Tell me about the reporting and analytics features
item.description:
Overview of Reporting and Analytics Features link

SmartWeb’s reporting and analytics features are powerful tools that help improve the efficiency and effectiveness of customer support operations. They support data-driven decision making and provide detailed visualization of team performance.

Key Metrics Provided link

Metrics such as ticket volume, resolution time, agent performance, and customer satisfaction (CSAT) are automatically aggregated and visualized on an intuitive dashboard. Specifically, the following analyses are possible:

item.title: Is there a mobile app?
item.description:
Mobile App Overview link

With the LiveAgent mobile app, you can handle tickets and respond to chats on the go.

Supported OS Device Download
iOS iPhone / iPad App Store
Android Smartphone / Tablet Google Play

Main Features link

Ticket Management link

Feature Description
Ticket Handling View, reply to, and resolve new tickets
Ticket Transfer Transfer to other agents or departments
Filters Organize tickets with preset filters
Tags & Notes View tags and agent notes

Real-time Notifications link

Feature Description
Push Notifications Instantly receive alerts for new inquiries
Chat Notifications Receive customer messages in real-time
Status Updates Get notified of ticket status changes

Chat Support link

Feature Description
Live Chat Real-time chat with customers
Chat Responses Reply instantly even when away from office
Chat History Review past conversations

Mobile App Benefits link

Benefit Description
Location Independent Provide customer support outside the office
Instant Response Start responding quickly with push notifications
Business Continuity Maintain support quality while traveling or away
Prevent Opportunity Loss Avoid customer churn due to delayed responses

Usage Scenarios link

  • Emergency Response While Out - Respond immediately to urgent inquiries
  • Remote Work - Support operations from home or cafes
  • During Sales Visits - Make effective use of travel time
  • At Event Venues - Provide on-site customer support

Download Instructions link

iOS (iPhone / iPad) link

Search for “LiveAgent” on the App Store and download

item.title: Can it be used as an internal help desk?
item.description:
Introduction link

It can be utilized as an internal help desk.

Use Cases for Internal Use link

Department-Specific Usage Scenarios link

  • IT Department: System troubleshooting, account application management
  • HR Department: Inquiries about internal policies, procedure guidance
  • General Affairs Department: Equipment requests, facility reservation handling
  • Accounting Department: Expense reimbursement, billing-related inquiries

Benefits of Internal Use link

Key Points for Business Efficiency link

  • Centralized management of inquiry history
  • Reduction of inquiries through internal FAQ construction
  • Visualization and reporting of response status
  • Smooth handoffs between departments

Security and Usage Restrictions link

Setting Methods for Internal Users Only link

By placing the chat widget on pages accessible only through the internal intranet or VPN, you can limit access to internal users only.

item.title: Can I manage multiple brands?
item.description:
Multi-Brand Support Overview link

Yes, you can manage support operations for multiple brands with a single account.

Multi-Brand Management Features link

Department Management link

  • Department Function: Independent inquiry management for each brand

Customization Features link

  • Customer Portal: Set different designs and URLs for each brand
  • Email Templates: Use different signatures and logos for each brand

Use Case Scenarios link

Usage Examples by Business Type link

  • Operate multiple e-commerce sites and handle each as a separate brand
  • Use a shared system between parent and subsidiary companies
  • Separate service windows for B2B and B2C products

Reporting link

Analytics Features link

  • Brand-specific inquiry analysis
  • Cross-brand reporting is also possible

Usage Conditions link

Available at no additional cost.

item.title: How to Handle Multiple Branches or Stores?
item.description:
Support for Multiple Branches and Stores link

Yes, we support usage across multiple branches and stores.

Department Management link

You can create “departments” for each store or branch and automatically route inquiries accordingly.

Usage Scenarios link

Flexible Inquiry Management link

  • Independent inquiry management for Tokyo headquarters, Osaka branch, and Fukuoka branch
  • Separate chat buttons for Store A and Store B
  • Department-specific business hours and holiday settings

Report Analysis link

Detailed Performance Visualization link

  • Number of inquiries by branch/store
  • Response time comparison analysis
  • Company-wide reports also available

Implementation Cost link

Setting up multiple departments is available at no additional charge.

item.title: Is integration into WordPress sites easy?
item.description:
Easy Integration Method for WordPress link

Automatic Installation with Plugin link

Using SmartWeb’s free WordPress plugin, you can easily integrate chat buttons in just a few minutes. After installing the plugin, simply enter your dedicated API key and chat buttons will be automatically installed across your entire site. The main features include:

  • Easy installation with one click
  • Automatically reflected on all pages
  • Customizable design settings
  • Optimized for mobile devices

SmartWeb’s Support Services link

For WordPress operators, SmartWeb provides professional support services. For customers who find plugin installation difficult or desire more detailed configuration, we offer the following services:

item.title: Is IT expertise required for setup?
item.description:
No IT expertise required link

Initial setup supported by specialist staff link

Our staff will handle the configuration. We will provide guidance and support for any settings that require customer-side configuration, so you can rest assured. During initial implementation, our specialist staff will carefully support everything from email system environment setup to configuration. Customers only need to provide minimal information and perform simple verification tasks.

User-friendly management interface link

Advanced IT knowledge is not required for daily operations. The management interface features an intuitive UI, and basic operations can be learned with a feel similar to email software. For example, user management, email settings, security settings, and more can be performed with simple operations such as:

item.title: Customer Support Glossary
item.description:
Customer Support Glossary link

A comprehensive guide to key terms used in customer support operations.

AI Technology link

AI Engines & Core Technologies link

Term Description
RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) A technique where AI generates responses by first retrieving relevant information from specified knowledge bases and then creating answers based on that information.
Large Language Model (LLM) AI systems trained on vast amounts of text data that can understand and generate natural language. Examples include ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini.
Generative AI AI technology capable of creating new content such as text, images, and audio.
Natural Language Processing NLP. Technology that enables computers to understand and process human language.
Machine Learning AI technology that learns patterns from data to make predictions and decisions.

AI-Powered Features link

Term Description
AI Chatbot A system that uses AI to automatically respond to customer inquiries. Capable of 24/7 operation.
AI Response Assistant An AI feature that helps agents with writing. Capable of improving responses, translation, and tone adjustment.
Knowledge Gap Detection A feature that analyzes questions AI couldn’t answer to identify gaps in the knowledge base.
Intent Classification A feature that automatically determines the purpose or intent from customer inquiry content.
Guardrails Safety features that prevent AI from providing inappropriate responses.

Support Features link

Ticket Management link

Term Description
Ticket A unit for managing customer inquiries. Each ticket is assigned a unique number for tracking response status.
Ticket Management System A system that centrally manages inquiries as “tickets.” LiveAgent is a prime example of this system.
Escalation The process of transferring inquiries that cannot be handled by AI or first-line responders to senior staff or specialized departments.
Tags Labels assigned to tickets for categorization and search purposes.
SLA (Service Level Agreement) Contracts or rules that define target response times and resolution times.
Rules/Automation Features that automatically execute ticket routing or status changes based on specified conditions.

Communication Channels link

Term Description
Live Chat A feature that enables real-time text communication on websites.
Omnichannel A system that integrates multiple channels such as email, chat, phone, and social media for unified support.
Unified Inbox A feature that allows managing inquiries from multiple channels in a single interface.
Customer Portal A website where customers can search FAQs and check the status of their inquiries independently.
Forum A community feature where customers can exchange information with each other and with support staff.

Knowledge Management link

Term Description
Knowledge Base A database that stores FAQs, manuals, product information, and other resources. Serves as the source for AI chatbot responses.
Canned Responses (Macros) Templated responses for commonly used replies. Helps ensure quick responses and consistent quality.
FAQ Frequently Asked Questions. A collection of common questions and their answers.

Customer Support Metrics link

Performance Metrics link

Term Description
First Response Time (FRT) The time it takes to provide the initial response to a customer inquiry.
Resolution Time The time it takes to resolve an inquiry from start to finish.
First Call Resolution (FCR) The percentage of issues resolved during the first interaction.
CSAT Customer Satisfaction. A metric that measures customer satisfaction levels.
NPS Net Promoter Score. A metric that measures customer loyalty by asking customers to rate their likelihood to recommend on a scale of 0-10.

Operational Efficiency Metrics link

Term Description
Self-Service Rate The percentage of customers who resolve their issues independently using FAQs or knowledge bases.
Agent Utilization Rate The percentage of time agents spend actively handling support tasks.
Concurrent Handling Capacity The number of tickets or chats a single agent can handle simultaneously.

System Integration link

Term Description
API Application Programming Interface. A connection point that enables data exchange between systems.
CRM Customer Relationship Management. A system that centrally manages customer information and interaction history.
Webhook A mechanism that automatically notifies external systems when specific events occur.
SSO Single Sign-On. An authentication method that allows access to multiple systems with a single login.

SmartWeb-Related Terms link

Term Description
FlowHunt A no-code AI platform used by SmartWeb for building AI chatbots.
LiveAgent A helpdesk system used by SmartWeb that provides ticket management, live chat, and multichannel support capabilities.
Quality Unit The Slovak company that develops FlowHunt and LiveAgent.

item.title: Marketing & Sales Glossary
item.description:
Basic Marketing Strategies link

Basic Strategy Planning Framework link

Japanese English Explanation
4P Product / Price / Place / Promotion A basic framework for building strategies around the four elements: product, price, distribution, and promotion.
STP Segmentation / Targeting / Positioning Organizing “who to sell to, what to sell, and how to sell” through market segmentation, target selection, and positioning design.

Customer Understanding and Strategic Design link

Japanese English Explanation
Customer Journey Customer Journey Visualizing behavior from awareness to usage. Useful for identifying and improving drop-off points.
Brand Strategy Brand Strategy A differentiation strategy that creates a state where customers choose based on value other than price (trust, security).
Persona Design Persona Design Concretizing the ideal customer profile to improve the precision of actions.
ICP (Ideal Customer Profile) Ideal Customer Profile, ICP The profile of customer companies that bring the most value. The starting point for ABM and targeting.

Digital Marketing Methods link

Web Marketing link

Japanese English Explanation
SEM Search Engine Marketing Paid measures with immediate effect for attracting customers through search advertising.
SEO Search Engine Optimization Optimization for top search rankings. Increases organic traffic.
Landing Page (LP) Landing Page (LP) A dedicated page that leads directly to conversions through consistent messaging and CTA placement.

Digital Marketing Tactics link

Japanese English Explanation
A/B Testing A/B Testing Comparing multiple options under the same conditions and adopting the one with higher CVR or CTR.
CTA Call To Action Elements that encourage the next action. Placement and wording significantly affect results.
Email Marketing Email Marketing A classic yet effective measure to encourage repeat purchases and inquiries.
Content Marketing Content Marketing Building trust through valuable information provision and creating business opportunities.
Social Media Marketing Social Media Marketing Spreading and relationship building through SNS. Guideline establishment is important.
Marketing Automation Marketing Automation High-efficiency operation with a small team through automation of emails and other processes.

Marketing Metrics link

Japanese English Explanation
KPI Key Performance Indicator Intermediate indicators for reaching goals. Essential for progress management.
Conversion Rate Conversion Rate (CVR) The percentage of visitors who achieved the target action.

Sales and Lead Management link

Account-Based Marketing link

Japanese English Explanation
ABM Account-Based Marketing A strategy of focusing concentrated investment on key accounts.
ICP (Ideal Customer Profile) Ideal Customer Profile, ICP The profile of customer companies that bring the most value. The starting point for ABM and targeting.

Lead Management and Nurturing link

Japanese English Explanation
CRM Customer Relationship Management Centralized management of customer information and history for relationship maintenance and expansion.
Lead Generation Lead Generation Acquiring prospects through advertising, exhibitions, web inquiries, etc.
Lead Scoring Lead Scoring Scoring based on behavior and attributes to determine response priority.
Lead Nurturing Lead Nurturing Relationship building through continuous information provision. Used in conjunction with MA and content distribution.
MQL / SQL Marketing Qualified Lead / Sales Qualified Lead Improving handoff accuracy by aligning marketing handoff criteria with sales acceptance criteria.

Sales Strategy and Growth link

Japanese English Explanation
Cross-sell / Upsell Cross-sell / Upsell Improving customer unit price by proposing related products or premium versions.
Sales Pipeline Sales Pipeline Visualizing deal progress to improve forecast accuracy.
SDR / BDR Sales Development Rep / Business Development Rep Dedicated roles for creating opportunities through inbound/outbound activities.
Sales Enablement Sales Enablement Building systems and assets for sales to achieve results with high reproducibility.

Performance Measurement and Analysis link

Customer Acquisition and Profitability Metrics link

Japanese English Explanation
CAC Customer Acquisition Cost Acquisition cost per customer. Compare with LTV to determine profitability.
CAC Payback Period CAC Payback Period Period until CAC recovery. An indicator of capital efficiency and growth health.
LTV Life Time Value Lifetime sales value. The foundation of retention strategy.
ROI Return on Investment Basic indicator of return on investment.

Digital Metrics and Analysis link

Japanese English Explanation
CTR Click Through Rate Click-through rate against impressions. Representative indicator of interest level.
ROAS Return on Advertising Spend Sales effectiveness against advertising spend. Efficiency indicator specialized for advertising.
Attribution Model Attribution Model Allocating contribution of each touchpoint for optimal investment utilization.
Impressions Impressions Number of displays. Important indicator for the awareness phase.
Cohort Analysis Cohort Analysis Analysis tracking continuation and behavior by acquisition timing.
Retention Rate Retention Rate Percentage of continued usage. KPI for churn prevention and revenue stability.

Advertising Cost Metrics link

Japanese English Explanation
CPC / CPM / CPA / CPL Cost Per Click / Mille / Action / Lead The four basic indicators of advertising cost efficiency.
